post.author: 임 정숙
post.content:
If you are interested in this job please email me with your resume and cover letter first before you contact the person indicated below.
I have some relationship with this company and I think it could be easier for you if I refer you. But if you want to contact them directly, go right ahead!  My contact information is  (limjungs@hotmail.com)

Cheers:-)
--------------------------------------

THE ARTAFFAIRS GROUP IS A LEADING B2B COMPANY PROVIDING MARKETING AND TECHNOLOGY SOLUTIONS TO THE ART AND FRAMING INDUSTRY.

We are currently looking for a talented Senior Web Designer who can help us in the development of our products for businesses in the Art and Framing Industry throughout Europe and North America. This is a full time position at our head-office in Thornhill, Ontario.

Must have Skills:

-A degree or equivalent certificate in Graphics, Design, or a related field

-At least 5 years of experience in Web Designing (Graphics and HTML).

-Experience in print and multimedia.

-Excellent (proven) working knowledge of Quark Xpress, Illustrator, Photoshop, Flash, Acrobat (for either Mac or PC platforms).

-A motivated and detail-oriented individual who is able to work under tight deadlines.

Please fax or e-mail resume to: (NO PHONE CALLS PLEASE)

Ilana Pen Gudes, Project Manager 905-886-2747 ilana@artaffairs.com
post.title: Senior Web Designer
